name: WP-DreamLists
author: Ethan Piliavin

sections.description:
A WordPress plugin that allows visitors to subscribe to Dreamhost announce lists via a widget, as well as view and manage the lists in the WordPress admin panel. Additionally the WP Admin can send HTML emails to the lists using the current
Wordpress template.

Think of it as a poor man’s version of the Constant Contact service! All due to the Dreamhost API.
sections.installation: Do what you do with all the other plugins….

short_description: Subscribe to Dreamhost announce lists via widget, view & manage lists in the admin and send HTML emails to the list. A poor mans Constant Contact!
